enhanced_description: KarmaV is an AI framework that leverages intelligent automation to streamline the hiring process and address common recruitment challenges. It aims to mitigate recruitment biases, establish workforce diversity, and support an agile and equitable employee retention workflow. The platform provides recruiters and hiring managers with a simple, fast, and data-driven approach to identify, pre-screen, and match qualified candidates with open positions. It also helps elevate the employer brand and create customized candidate outreach plans to boost job application rates and hiring manager productivity.
